mapper.select: SELECT r.id AS r_id, r.room_name AS r_roomName, r.status AS r_status, r.gmt_created AS r_gmtCreated, r.gmt_modified AS r_gmtModified, p.id AS p_id, p.user_id AS p_userId, p.room_id AS p_roomId, p.balance AS p_balance, p.position AS p_position, p.status AS p_status, p.gmt_created AS p_gmtCreated, p.gmt_modified AS p_gmtModified FROM room as r left OUTER JOIN player as p ON r.id = p.room_id

SELECT r.id AS r_id, r.room_name AS r_roomName, r.status AS r_status, r.gmt_created AS r_gmtCreated, r.gmt_modified AS r_gmtModified, p.id AS p_id, p.user_id AS p_userId, p.room_id AS p_roomId, p.balance AS p_balance, p.position AS p_position, p.status AS p_status, p.gmt_created AS p_gmtCreated, p.gmt_modified AS p_gmtModified FROM room as r left OUTER JOIN player as p ON r.id = p.room_id WHERE r.id = ${id}
